attributes.action: Stop puberty blockers trials on children
attributes.additional_details: Make it a criminal offense for anyone giving puberty blockers to anyone under 18
attributes.background: Immediately STOP all puberty blocker trials on Children under 18

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Cancel the clinical trial into puberty blockers & safeguard vulnerable children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751839
